data.name: Warface - Medic Tournament Pack
data.detailed_description:
This gear is the best possible choice for a medic, whether a newcomer or a master of the game. The gear consist of full equipment from head to toe and a superb primary weapon. All of the items boast class-specific and PvP-oriented perks.



Contains the following items:
  • Medic Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 70%. Increases head protection by 20%. Regenerates 7 health points over time after 4 secs with no hits.
  • Open Cup shoes - Increases speed while sprinting by 5%. Increases sprint distance by 50%. Delays claymore activation by 3 sec.
  • Open Cup gloves - Increases accuracy by 10% and weapon selection/deselection speed by 20%.
  • Open Cup vest - Increases weapon reloading speed by 10%, provides 40% explosive protection, 20% melee damage protection and 10 pt absorption.
  • The SX-41 - The SX-41 is a mag-fed tactical pump-action shotgun system. It is the upgraded version of the MSG 500 Custom and features include a forend which improves accuracy, a detachable grip with increased RPM, a Drum Mag to provide rapid reloads, and high ammunition capacity.



This weapon comes with unique achievements for 10000 and 25000 kills.



All Champion’s gear is allowed in official tournaments; these items are also permanent. Don’t underestimate preparation and secure your victory!

data.short_description: This set consists of full and permanent medic tournament gear, as well as the class-specific primary, the SX-41 shotgun. This gear is the perfect choice for PvP missions and contracts. Find only the most useful class-specific stats for PvP combat. Gear up, do a brass check and let nothing stay in your way – no one sensible will!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10ws 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
